item.title: Visualizing fits, inference, implications of (G)LMMs
item.author: ashander AT rff org (Jaime Ashander)
item.description: In a live walk-through on April 10 at the Davis R-Users Group, I gave a brief presentation motivating this topic. This post expands and cleans up the code from that talk. If you just want the code: download the .R file. Updated 2015-04-28 The point of this post isnâ€™t the statistics of mixed models. For that, learning the experimental design and statistics behind modern mixed models, I recommend some relatively recent papers below.
